item.title: The BMDM Thread: Discussions and Brainstroming about BMDM
item.dc:creator: Margato
item.description:
BMDM IDEAS
Aliens Vs HECU
I was thinking about a gamemode like this… Sounds really hard to code though, but some gmod mods did it.
Players playing as aliens.
Aliens playable : Bullsquid, Houndeye, Alien grunt , Headcrab,and vorts.
I think Players playing as aliens against players as HECU would be a awesome TDM mode. Just think about it! Features: Aliens can munch on dead bodies. IT regans their health. (thats it). Also, theres 2 modes of this gamemode. Theres 1 where aliens have unlimited lives and HECU has only 1 for each player, or Where both sides have unlimited lives with objectives.

Survival

Playing as HECU grunts, a team of 2-8 must hold out waves of XEN creatures.
The last wave is 25. The Boss wave is just 25. It’s the Gauntlala or something. If 1 player dies, and 7 are left, the player that died can respawn next wave. But if about 4 players die on a wave, and theres 4 left, the players that died cannot respawn until 5 waves. If there’s only 1 player left, the game is over. (Unless your doing it by yourself on your own server)

Escape

A group of secruity guards or scientist plan to make an escape…You and your friends must battle your way out of blackmesa, with events that can kill you. Like ceilings breaking and impacting you. No respawns on this. The escapes would be: Escape by car, truck, Helicopter, boat, or maybe death.

What I want to see in BMDM: NOOOO BUnnyhopping (I think this has already been annouced

Health for players decreased, unless your playing as a non-human thing or something.

Playable XEN creatures ( W00t my first idea)

Realistic damage (like 2nd one, under no bunnyhopping)

:fffuuu: Byeeee! I hope you add some of these!

item.dc:creator: elivance
item.description:
pierow:

Please include bunnyhopping and other high skill mechanics or a cvar for it. These kinds of mechanics are staples of deathmatch games and would be very boring with out them. Generally anyone that is uninterested in this type of gameplay wouldn’t stick around for long in a deathmatch game because they’re incredibly basic without it. As it stands there hasn’t been a game like this since hl2dm and painkiller (the remake is too buggy) and there are a lot of people are playing stuff like quake live waiting for a new game to come along.

Really the developers have the choice of making a game that will be popular for a couple of weeks then die off or a game that will be popular for a couple of weeks and have a lasting small to potentially large community.

From BM wiki:

Is strafe-jump (bunnyhop) and Tau-jump possible in BM: DM?

No to strafe-jump [7], yes to Tau-jump [8].

Ok?

item.title: The BMDM Thread: Discussions and Brainstroming about BMDM
item.dc:creator: elivance
item.description:
pRopaaNS:

Calmbrained ideas:

2.Weapons.
2.1. Colt: increase its rate of fire, because on DM its slow fire rate is bane of its power.
2.2. Hivehand: lower its damage to have same power as in old HL, because the only reason why it currencly is stronger than before is because its tweaked to be more useful at SP playthrough. 2.3. Snarks: increase theyr speed and maybe make them smaller, as in old HL they were fast and hard to hit with frontal approach. 2.4. MP5: remove burstfire pls! If I want to burst then I can just hold mouse1, I dont like how game restricts gameplay with this weapon.

  • Colt: I disagree with you, this weapon it’s a mid/long range weapon.
    It’s for sniping.

  • Hivehand: should be nerfed in SP too. it’s really op, kills the fun.
    I would reduce its firing speed and its recharge speed.

  • Mp5: Don’t know, maybe I would reduce it a little but honestly this weapon is more or less the smg of hl2.

  • Snarks: They are really hard to hit even with a shotgun, I would not modify them

Brainstormed ideas:

  • make maps specialized for specific weapons, like glock-only map, rpg-only map, etc.
  • for team vs team game mode if such will be made, scienists vs hecu.
  • support moster spawns to allow some creative maps beign made for mod.
  • xen themed map without ranged weapons, for players to utilize hev suit, granades, other explosives, crowbar- map layout would consist of main island below and small floating islands to jump accross, something like when we first enter Xen on original HL.

I agree completely with you

item.description:
Gun game is fun. If the BM devs don’t include it as a native mode, someone will mod it, no doubt.

Gun games work better on some maps than others. I don’t know if the devs are so concerned about modding their own game. It’s already a good bit of work to make the game itself. I suspect that they might leave gameplay modes like gun game to the community, but I honestly don’t know. It makes sense to concentrate their time and effort into the game itself, and leave stuff like that to the community.
